title: Capture Requirements Specification
preconditions: User is logged into the application.
steps: Navigate to the requirements capture section.
expected_result: The requirement is saved successfully and displayed in the requirements list.

title: Manage Custom Attributes for Requirements
preconditions: User has captured at least one requirement.
steps: Select a requirement from the list.
Add a custom attribute with valid data.
expected_result: The custom attribute is added and displayed under the selected requirement.

title: Setup Requirements Traceability
preconditions: User is logged into the application.
steps: Navigate to the traceability setup section.
expected_result: The traceability link is created and displayed in the traceability matrix.

title: Browse Requirements Traceability Matrix
preconditions: User has set up at least one traceability link.
steps: Navigate to the traceability matrix section.
expected_result: The traceability matrix is displayed with all defined links.

title: Comment on Requirement
preconditions: User has access to a requirement.
steps: Add a comment in the comment section.
expected_result: The comment is added and displayed under the requirement.

title: Filter Requirements by Criteria
preconditions: User has multiple requirements saved.
expected_result: Only requirements matching the filter criteria are displayed.

title: Search for Specific Requirement
preconditions: User has multiple requirements saved.
steps: Enter a keyword in the search bar.
expected_result: The search results display requirements containing the keyword.

title: Import Requirements from MS Word
preconditions: User has a valid MS Word file.
expected_result: Requirements are imported successfully and displayed in the list.

title: Export Requirements to PDF
preconditions: User has requirements to export.
expected_result: Requirements are exported to a PDF file successfully.

title: Analyze Requirements Coverage
preconditions: User has captured multiple requirements.
steps: Navigate to the coverage analysis section.
expected_result: Coverage analysis report is generated and displayed.

title: Impact Analysis of Changes
preconditions: User has made changes to a requirement.
steps: Navigate to the impact analysis section.
expected_result: Impact analysis report is generated showing affected requirements.

title: Print Requirements Specifications
preconditions: User has requirements to print.
expected_result: Requirements specifications are printed successfully.

title: Attempt to Import Corrupted MS Word File
steps: Select a corrupted MS Word file.
expected_result: An error message is displayed indicating the file is corrupted.

title: Attempt to Export to Exceeding File Size Limit
preconditions: User has a document that exceeds the size limit.
expected_result: An error message is displayed indicating the file size exceeds the limit.

title: Filter/Search with No Matching Criteria
preconditions: User has multiple requirements saved.
steps: Select a filter criterion that does not match any requirement.
expected_result: No requirements are displayed.

title: Comment on Locked Requirement
preconditions: User has access to a locked requirement.
steps: Add a comment in the comment section.
expected_result: An error message is displayed indicating the requirement is locked.

title: Simultaneous Edits by Multiple Users
preconditions: Multiple users are logged in and editing the same requirement.
steps: User B attempts to edit the same requirement simultaneously.
expected_result: User B receives a notification that the requirement is being edited by another user.

title: Create Document with Unsaved Changes
preconditions: User has unsaved changes in an open document.
steps: Attempt to create a new document.
expected_result: A prompt appears asking the user to save changes before creating a new document.

title: Import Unsupported File Format
expected_result: An error message is displayed indicating the file format is not supported.

title: Export Document with No Content
preconditions: User has a document with no content.
expected_result: An error message is displayed indicating there is no content to export.

title: Change Custom Attribute Type with Incompatible Values
preconditions: User has a custom attribute with a specific type.
steps: Attempt to change the type of the custom attribute to an incompatible type.
expected_result: An error message is displayed indicating the change is not allowed.

title: Delete Requirement Referenced by Other Requirements
preconditions: User has a requirement that is referenced by another requirement.
expected_result: An error message is displayed indicating the requirement cannot be deleted.

title: Attach File Exceeding Size Limit
steps: Select a file that exceeds the size limit.
expected_result: An error message is displayed indicating the file exceeds the size limit.

title: Add Comment Without Text
preconditions: User has access to a requirement.
expected_result: An error message is displayed indicating the comment cannot be empty.

title: Remove Link Type with Existing Links
preconditions: User has a link type that has existing links.
expected_result: An error message is displayed indicating the link type cannot be removed.

title: Search with No Matching Results
preconditions: User has multiple requirements saved.
steps: Enter a keyword that does not match any requirement.
expected_result: No results are displayed.

title: Handle Unsupported File Types During Attachment
expected_result: An error message is displayed indicating the file type is not supported.

title: Auto Save Functionality
preconditions: User has made changes to a document.
expected_result: The changes are automatically saved without user intervention.

title: Clear Persisted Data on Document Closure
preconditions: User has unsaved changes in an open document.
expected_result: All unsaved changes are cleared and not persisted.

title: Record Changes to Requirements
preconditions: User has modified a requirement.
expected_result: The change is recorded with the author and timestamp.

title: Display Change History for Requirements
preconditions: User has modified a requirement.
expected_result: The change history is displayed with all modifications listed.

title: Print Displayed Requirements
preconditions: User has requirements displayed on the screen.
expected_result: Displayed requirements are printed successfully.

title: Create Document from Template
preconditions: User has a document template saved.
steps: Navigate to the document creation section.
expected_result: A new document is created based on the selected template.

title: Open Existing Document
preconditions: User has at least one document saved.
steps: Navigate to the open file section.
expected_result: The selected document opens successfully.

title: Save Changes to Document
preconditions: User has made changes to an open document.
expected_result: The changes are saved successfully.

title: Create Document Template
preconditions: User has a document open.
expected_result: A new document template is created successfully.

title: Display Table of Contents
preconditions: User has a document with sections.
steps: Navigate to the document view section.
expected_result: The table of contents is displayed with links to sections.

title: Display Requirements Table
preconditions: User has captured multiple requirements.
steps: Navigate to the requirements view section.
expected_result: The requirements are displayed in a sortable table format.

title: Show Detailed Information for Selected Requirement
preconditions: User has requirements displayed.
steps: Select a requirement from the table.
expected_result: Detailed information for the selected requirement is displayed.
